data.title: Is Jimmy Fallon Married and Does he Have Kids?
data.meta_description: We take a look at whether Jimmy Fallon is married or not, who he's married to, and if they have kids together.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Fans are curious about Jimmy Fallon’s personal life, including whether he’s married and if he has kids. He’s fairly reserved about his home life, and millions of viewers have watched him for years without knowing anything about his family. In fact, we know more about his dog Gary Frick than his wife and kids. So, if you’re interested in learning about Fallon’s marriage and whether he has kids or not, read below.

Is Jimmy Fallon Married?

Jimmy Fallon has only been married once. His first and only wife is Nancy Juvonen. She co-founded Flower Films with Drew Barrymore in 1993 and worked as a producer on the following films:

Never Been Kissed

Charlie’s Angels (2000)

Donnie Darko

Charlie’s Angels: Full Throttle

Duplex

50 First Dates

Fever Pitch

He’s Just Not That Into You

How to Be Single

The Stand-In

She was also an executive producer on these films:

Music and Lyrics

Whip It!

Charlie’s Angels (2011 TV series)

Charlie’s Angels (2019)

Juvonen and Fallon met on the set of Saturday Night Live but didn’t get to know each other until later when they were working on the set of Fever Pitch in 2005. Fallon proposed to Juvonen in August 2007, and the two were wed on December 22, 2007.

Does Jimmy Fallon have kids?

Jimmy Fallon has two children:

Winnie Rose Fallon (Born July 23, 2013)

Frances Cole Fallon (Born December 3, 2014)

Both daughters were born via surrogate as Fallon and Juvonen encountered fertility issues when trying to conceive.

Despite his reserved nature about his personal life, Fallon occasionally shares endearing stories and moments about his family on his show and social media. These glimpses reveal his deep love and dedication to his wife and daughters, adding a personal touch to his public persona and connecting with fans on a more intimate level.
